name: chatmate
description: Open source collection of specialized AI agents for VS Code Copilot Chat

scripts.test: npm run test:shell && npm run test:markdown && npm run test:integration && npm run test:cli
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test && echo 'Coverage analysis complete'
scripts.test:watch: nodemon --exec 'npm test' --watch tests --watch mates --watch hire.sh --watch bin --watch lib
scripts.setup:bats: npm run install:bats-core && npm run install:bats-support && npm run install:bats-assert
scripts.install:bats-core: git clone https://github.com/bats-core/bats-core.git tests/bats-core || echo 'Bats core already installed'
scripts.install:bats-support: git clone https://github.com/bats-core/bats-support.git tests/bats-support || echo 'Bats support already installed'
scripts.install:bats-assert: git clone https://github.com/bats-core/bats-assert.git tests/bats-assert || echo 'Bats assert already installed'
scripts.lint: shellcheck hire.sh tests/**/*.bats && eslint bin/*.js lib/*.js
scripts.validate: npm run test && npm run lint
scripts.ci: npm run setup && npm run validate
scripts.postinstall: echo 'âœ… ChatMate CLI installed successfully! Run "chatmate --help" to get started.'

author: Jonas Siebler <jonas@siebler.dev>
